participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, Emily is eager to make new connections and is passionate about her interests.
participant_1.background: My first day of safety patrol is a little nerve-wracking, but I'm excited to help keep my school safe. Pudding makes me gassy. I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia. I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike. I have an interest in fashion and try to wear nice clothes every day.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Sensitive and caring, Michael is devoted to his family and finds solace in his pets and music.
participant_2.background: I've kept my wife's terminal cancer a secret from my parents because I don't want them to worry. I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days. My cat is my most prized possession. I take a deep breath and sing my favorite song in the shower. I love to watch The Voice.

content.text: Hi! I just moved to Australia and I'm a little nervous about starting my new job as a safety patrol officer at my school.
Hi! Congratulations on your new job! Safety patrol is an important job and I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to meeting my new colleagues and helping to keep my school safe.
I'm sure you'll fit right in! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to quilt and go hiking. I also love to watch The Voice and spend time with my dog.
Quilting is so relaxing and I love hiking too. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's the best dog in the world!
Golden retrievers are the best! I have a cat named Mittens.
Cats are great too! I love cuddling with my dog on rainy days.
That sounds so relaxing. I love to cuddle with my cat too.
It's so nice to meet you! I hope we can be friends.
I'd love that! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun together.
